definition: (usually in combinations) one of several layers of cloth or paper or wood as in plywood, use diligently
details:
noun
- (usually in combinations) one of several layers of cloth or paper or wood as in plywood
- one of the strands twisted together to make yarn or rope or thread
verb
- use diligently
= example: use diligently
- give what is desired or needed, especially support, food or sustenance
= synonyms: supply
- wield vigorously
= example: wield vigorously
- join together as by twisting, weaving, or molding
= example: join together as by twisting, weaving, or molding
- travel a route regularly
= example: travel a route regularly
= synonyms: run
- apply oneself diligently
